@dev Fallback function allows to deposit ether.

@notice Returns user's balance
 @return The user's balance in the contract
@notice Circuit Breaker - Triggers emergency mode
@notice Circuit Breaker - Ends emergency mode

buyProduct(uint256).details: It will be stopped in case of emergency

params.productId: The id of the product to be purchased

returns._0: The user's balance in the contract

constructor.details: Contract constructor sets initial Product Token address and Biodiversity Fund address

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

setNewBiodiversityFund(address).details: Circuit Breaker - Emergency mode should be triggered

setNewProductContract(address).details: Circuit Breaker - Emergency mode should be triggered

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

params.withdrawAmount: The amount of money to be withdraw

returns._0: The user's balance in the contract

buyProduct(uint256).notice: Buy a product in the marketplace

setNewBiodiversityFund(address).notice: Register the address of the Multi Signature Wallet that manages the Biodiversity Fund

setNewProductContract(address).notice: Register the address of the contract that creates the products

userdoc.notice: Sells tokenized biodiversity products and complies with the Nagoya Protocol by sending 1% of the sales to a biodiversity fund
